name: Thunder Core
desc: When the Rainblade from Acheron's Ultimate hits enemy targets with Crimson Knot, her DMG increases by #1[i]%, stacking up to #2[i] time(s) and lasting for #3[i] turn(s). And when Stygian Resurge triggers, additionally deals DMG for #4[i] times. Each time deals Lightning DMG equal to #5[i]% of Acheron's ATK to a single random enemy and is viewed as part of the Ultimate DMG.
